/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in a palette of colors that add vibrancy to the scene. Cars and pedestrians animate the street, contributing to the dynamic energy of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a serene contrast to the urban landscape below.
